body: @cyberone this task is yours, please help (see our key [principles of work](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles)). If you have any technical questions, don't hesitate to ask right here
@cyberone Total fixed cost of this task is **30 mins** (see [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) for more info)
@dmarkov I don't see reply at http://developer.github.com/v3/issues/comments/#create-a-comment. Can You give me a hint?

@dmarkov, I can't find information about replying to a specified comment in Github API. Either comment argument is redundant or there's some secret way to reply to a comment I don't know. So let's change the task definition or remove it or reassign it from me.

@cyberone it takes too long. Usually, we expect any task to be finished in less than a week. I'll assign someone else. See our [no obligations](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles#no-obligations) principle
@alexdag This task is yours, please go ahead keeping in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). If any questions, don't hesitate to ask right here

@alexdag **30 mins** is the budget of the task. This is exactly how much will be paid when the problem is solved (no matter how much time you will actually spend). See [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) for more information

@alexdag the task is your hands for the last 12 days.. keep in mind that if it's not closed in the next 48 hours, it will be re-assigned to someone else, see [No Obligations](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles#no-obligations) principle
dmarkov: this test method will use not implemented method with UnsupportedOperationException in RtPullComments.java 112-114.

@alexdag you've been working with this task for too long. I'm sorry, but I'll assign someone else. Please stop working with it. See our [no obligations](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles#no-obligations) principle
